abstract: The Deal Professor contends that the Winklevoss brothers are unlikely to succeed in their case to undo a legal settlement with Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg, its co-founder.
snippet: The Deal Professor contends that the Winklevoss brothers are unlikely to succeed in their case to undo a legal settlement with Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg, its co-founder.
lead_paragraph: Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss are likely to lose the battle to undo their legal settlement with Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg, the social network’s co-founder.

headline.main: Twins’ Uphill Battle With Facebook and Zuckerberg
